max_mobs_to_fight.label: Max Mobs to Fight
max_mobs_to_fight.tooltip: Set the maximum number of mobs to engage in combat. (0 for unlimited)

mob_lifetime_seconds_requirement.label: Mob Lifetime Seconds Requirement
mob_lifetime_seconds_requirement.tooltip: Set the time (seconds) a mob must exist before it can be engaged.

focus_forlorns.label: Focus Forlorns
focus_forlorns.tooltip: Enable or disable focusing on Forlorn mobs during combat.

prevent_movement_while_fighting_gathered.label: Prevent Movement While Fighting Gathered Mobs
prevent_movement_while_fighting_gathered.tooltip: Enable to prevent movement while in the fighting gathered mobs state.
